name: Scammer.info Purple/Gold
description:
This theme is still in its earliest beta!
There will be bugs and graphical issues. Post them on the comments below or talk to me on discord! 

Since this theme is being used by quite a few people. I will continue to update it monthly. :)

Features:
-Has a custom cursor!
-Darker Color
-Transparent Menus


To Do:
-Make a new logo to fit current theme ☑
-Overhaul Colors ☑
-Rebuild Layouts 
-Make Mobile Friendly

Currently Broken:
-Some Text is unreadable in Settings
-Other colors yet to have been applied
additional_info:
Beta V0.01
-Initial Theme

Beta V0.02
-Fixed some menus and color issues
-FAQ Fixed and Cleaned up
-Reply Box is now custom
-Cleaned up most of the ugly white boxes (not all of them)
**NOTE THERE IS NOT SCAMMER.INFO LOGO/HOME BUTTON** Use your back key!

Beta V0.03
-Removed animation when hovering posts (Made animation time infinite)
-Fixed Post Mention to match page better
-Fixed Scrubber to better match theme
-Fixed TagLabels (next to post names)
-Smaller fixes not worth mentioning

Beta V0.04
-Added custom logo replacing original red and white one. (Very hacky and forced code)
-Added animations! 

Bugs:
-General Bug. I cannot change some colors yet. I will have to directly download the css scripts of the site to better understand what animations point to.
-Bug has been found when using Scrubber on the side of posts. Causing the browser to lag.
-Bug has been found when opening thread "The new scambaiting calling service is now live" 
[This bug is due to the amount of posts on the thread preventing the page from loading.]

Beta V0.05
-Fixed discussion Fullscreen and Quick Post
-Added colors to Scrubber
-Added color fixes to left categories
-Small Edits to overall refinement

Bugs:
-Settings Page color issues.
-Using the side menu, while viewing a post, will be difficult to use.

Beta V0.1
-Fixed scrubber on side of posts
-Fixed title of posts (had no color properties)
-Fixed color palette
-Fixed Settings page

Bugs still remain.

Update Beta 0.7
-Fixed UserCard-info (status messages on user pages)
-Fixed Teh Scrubber AGAIN OMG WTF

Update Beta 0.8
-Tuned animations to use less browser resources
- Fixed a few Cursor issues

Update Beta 0.9
-Fixed "Best Answer" Posts

Update beta 0.9.1
-removed broken animations

This theme will not be updated for a while.


11/18/19
-Updated to work with new theme

v1.0
-Updated colors
-Removed animations
-Fixed "Settings Page"
